title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 611.4 - Environmental protection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 611.4 - Environmental protection

State Regulations

The deployment of booms, physical barriers or other
equipment specifically for the protection of areas of environmental value, as
identified by the department representative, should occur in addition to the
deployment of booms, physical barriers or other equipment to contain a
discharge and/or to protect human life, health or safety. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
611.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
